abstract: Shabab militants kill 14 people and wound 11 in grenade attack in Mandera, Kenya.
lead_paragraph: Shabab fighters killed 14 people and wounded 11 in the town of Mandera, a government official said, the latest attack in the region by the Islamist group.

headline.main: Somali Militants Carry Out Deadly Attack in Northeast Kenya
headline.print_headline: Somali Militants in Kenya Stage Deadly Grenade Attack

snippet: Shabab fighters killed 14 people and wounded 11 in the town of Mandera, a government official said, the latest attack in the region by the Islamist group.
